item.title: How I DIY-ed my own skincare routine
item.description: People aren’t born with flawless skin with built in filters from Snapchat or Instagram. In comparison to influencers on YouTube, Tiktok and bloggers, I’m not someone with a twenty-step skincare routine or someone who recommends buying skincare that would break your bank. Am I like everyone else who will buy a product because it was trending – yes. But I am also that girl who gets overwhelmed by thirty-minute videos on skincare.
